definition[0]: to say something in a loud whisper
example[1]: She hissed at me to be quiet.
definition[1]: to make a noise which sounds like ‘ssss’
example[3]: Snakes only hiss when they are afraid.
definition[2]: if a crowd hisses a speaker, they interrupt them with angry sounds to show that they do not like them
example[4]: He was booed and hissed during a stormy meeting.
